ygData.subject: My opinion on the safest Freeport<->Qeynos route.
ygData.msgSnippet: In my opinion, if you want the absolute safest route, go the Runnyeye route. I ve never had a bad experience in either, but the former is definitely as safe as
ygData.messageBody:
In my opinion, if you want the absolute safest route, go the Runnyeye
route. I've never had a bad experience in either, but the former is
definitely as safe as you can get if you're careful. There's very little
chance of getting trained or something spawning right where you're
standing. Just remember, in the gorge go CRAZY high up on the wall. You'll
be fine, trust me. Be anal about it, take 20 minutes to do it if you
wish... unless you have extreme bad luck or make an awful mistake you'll be
alright.
Just my opinion. It's not the fastest or the most convenient way but it's
the safest as far as I'm concerned.

Finally used Lament to escape certain death, very fun ;) I was basically
crawling as a beastie whacked on me. Managed to keep it from getting close
cuz I lamented it every time it did. Must've looked odd to the crowd of
bemused onlookers. But while I was fumbling in my inventory to equip my
drum I accidentally dropped a backpack I was carrying full of juicy loot. I
went back for it, like the fiend that I am - with about 15 hp's or so (this
is AFTER I had zoned), but didn't find it.

So I pulled a MASSIVE PSYCHO TRAAAAAAIN on everyone there out of spite!

Just kidding ;)



-----Original Message-----
From: A.Rubman [SMTP:Naturdoc@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 15, 1999 2:53 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Bardic Travel Question

From: "A.Rubman" <Naturdoc@...>

I keep hearing two opposing statements about travel.

I know I'm fast, I can outrun a griffin (sometimes), but then I hear if
I want to go to Qeynos there are two options. Either RunnEye or High
Hold Pass. I hear in HighHold there are gnolls who will kill me and in
RunnEye I'll have 10 creatures trained on me. I don't like to train, nor
do I like to die. So please let me know, whats the safest way for a
level 10 Bard to travel from Freeport to Qeynos.

-Luini the Bardic Tailor from Innoruk-
